mapper.update: update user set isCap=#{grno} where email=#{email}
mapper.select: select * from user join waiting on user.email=waiting.email where grno=#{grno} and isOk=1;
select user.name, user.email, user.age, user.phone, user.area, user.nickname, user.gender from smallgroup join user on smallgroup.grno=user.isCap where grno=#{grno};
